005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.command;
006
007/**
008 * A {@link StartCommand} will call the {@link Command#start() start()} method of another command
009 * when it is initialized and will finish immediately.
010 *
011 * <p>This class is provided by the OldCommands VendorDep
012 */
013public class StartCommand extends InstantCommand {
014  /** The command to fork. */
015  private final Command m_commandToFork;
016
017  /**
018   * Instantiates a {@link StartCommand} which will start the given command whenever its {@link
019   * Command#initialize() initialize()} is called.
020   *
021   * @param commandToStart the {@link Command} to start
022   */
023  public StartCommand(Command commandToStart) {
024    super("Start(" + commandToStart + ")");
025    m_commandToFork = commandToStart;
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  protected void initialize() {
030    m_commandToFork.start();
031  }
032}
